programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1850
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1053
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Iron Monkey 2
programme.desc: Iron Monkey teams up with a band of revolutionaries to fight a malevolent gang of weapon smugglers and takes revenge for his friends death.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughters company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boys marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liangs masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.desc: Tamil romantic comedy film, Starring, Anushka Shetty, Sonal Chauhan, Arya, Prakash Raj & Others

programme.title: 10,000 Bc
programme.desc: In a remote mountain tribe, the young hunter D'Leh (Steven Strait--The Covenant) has found his heart's passion, the beautiful Evolet (Camilla Belle--When a Stranger Calls). But when mysterious warlords kidnap Evolet, D'Leh leads a small group of hunters to the end of the world to save her -- battling prehistoric predators, braving the harshest elements and learning their ultimate fate lies in an empire beyond imagination, where great pyramids reach into the skies. Here they will take their stand against a tyrannical god. And it is here that D'Leh finally comes to understand that he has been called to save not only Evolet but all of civilization.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Terror On Skis - Part 2 - Hansworth complies with the request to trade his life for Sabrina's. Hansworth makes the rendezvous, but Sabrina escapes, telephoning the Angels to stop Carl. They arrive in time to stop the terrorists.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep21
programme.desc: Picture This - Potter wants a picture of the entire M*A*S*H unit as a gift for Mildreds birthday and is pleased with the simplicity of his idea. However, Hawkeye refuses to pose for the picture with Charles and B.J. due to a rift between the men that has led Hawkeye to move out of The Swamp and seek his own quarters. It takes some serious meddling but Mulcahy, Klinger and Hot Lips are able to negotiate a truce, Hawkeye returns to the swamp, and Mildred gets her photo in the end.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Louise's Cookbook - To George's disgruntlement, Louise is offered to write a cookbook.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Dear Sexy Knickers - Mr Lucas fancies Miss Brahms. No surprise there. He decides to write a love letter to her, but the letter falls into the hands of an altogether different woman, Mrs Slocombe!

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Chris-Crossed - Bianca arrives from the future to take Chris' powers. In an attempt to distract the Charmed Ones, Bianca casts a spell which causes the sisters to act on their true desires.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Angels In A Box - Jill Monroe returns to help find her kidnapped sister, Kris. After a witness description of the kidnapping, the Angels follow a lead that takes them to a tennis resort. Bosley recognizes two of this culprits.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Teen Angels - The Angels assume false identities to investigate a murder at a posh girls' school. During their probe, they discover that some of the girls are involved in drug and alcohol selling and abuse.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep22
programme.desc: That Darn Kid - A goat eats $22,000 in payroll cash while Hawkeye is paymaster and I-Corps is holding an in investigation. The I-Corps investigator, Major Van Zandt, determines the goat story implausible and says Hawkeye is responsible and must repay the money. After it is arranged that the goat in question eats Van Zandts report, Van Zandt sees things differently and Hawkeye is released from his obligation. While everyone else is concerned with the goat and the payroll, Charles is more concerned with the money he borrowed from Rizzo to buy a vase which turned out to be worthless. Rizzo charges %100 interest per day.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: The Three Gables - Isadora rejects Douglas Maberley, in favour of the young Duke of Lomond. Douglas dies after he completes the manuscript of his life story. Mary calls in Holmes to investigate his death.

programme.desc: Louise's Cookbook - To George's disgruntlement, Louise is offered to write a cookbook.

programme.desc: The Dying Detective - Holmes gets a visit from Adelaide Savage who is worried about her husband Victor's increasing habit of smoking opium to heighten his powers for writing poetry.

programme.desc: That Darn Kid - A goat eats $22,000 in payroll cash while Hawkeye is paymaster and I-Corps is holding an in investigation. After it is arranged that the goat in question eats Van Zandts report, Van Zandt sees things differently and Hawkeye is released from his obligation. programme.desc: Rest In Peace, Please / Psych Ward Spirit - The spirit of a dead soldier continues to haunt Paramedic Scott and his family. Security Officer Leah is called to an abandoned psych ward building after a 911 call that a man had been lurking around the premises.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep14
programme.desc: The "C" Word - Liz works overtime to prove to her writers that she's a good boss in "30 Rock".

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Day 436 - Adrian and Diane serve as outside counsel for a broadcast network planning to air a controversial segment that would derail the career of a beloved male movie star. Maia and Lucca have vastly different experiences while on separate ride-alongs with the Chicago Police Department.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Day 443 - Adrian becomes an overnight celebrity after his candid appearance on a cable news show goes viral. Lucca, who has yet to formally announce her pregnancy, worries about her future at the firm. Meanwhile, Adrians newfound cable news fame grabs the attention of Chicagos top law firm and the jury of his latest case.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Day 450 - A Democratic National Committee consultant, Ruth Eastman, approaches Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart to develop a confidential impeachment strategy for the DNC against President Trump, leaving the firm's partners at odds. After an impromptu visit from Colins mom, Lucca is left feeling suspicious of her motives. Maia is intrigued by Ruths assistant, Carine.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Day 457 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart represent an African-American undercover cop, Rashid Clarkson, who was left crippled after being shot by another Chicago police officer in the line of duty. The cases opposing counsel is legend Solomon Waltzer, whose tactics have the firm questioning the legitimacy of his evidence. Diane finds herself at a crossroads with both Kurt and Tully.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Day 464 - A Russian student asks Diane to protect her from deportation, claiming she was one of the women filmed with President Trump in the alleged Golden Shower tape. Meanwhile, Maia and Lucca suggest an unconventional lawyer to represent Jays friend Craig Savador at his upcoming appeal and Colin meets with the Cook County Democratic Committee.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Day 471 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart is left in disarray after a partner at the firm becomes the latest Kill All Lawyers victim by an unknown assailant. The Chicago police chief causes a stir when he goes after the firms high profile clients Lemond Bishop and Colin Sweeney as potential suspects. Amidst the chaos, Colin is reminded of his true feelings for Lucca.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Day 478 - Heated debates occur at the firm when Liz and Maia represent a well-known photographer, Ron Williams, suing a woman who provided an account of their relationship to a website. Jay continues to investigate possible suspects in Adrians shooting.

programme.title: Accused Ep7
programme.desc: Brenda's Story - When an acerbic female stand-up comic reports she was sexually assaulted at her friend's party, the DA decides her highly questionable past, and reputation obfuscates a conviction and drops all charges against the suspect. Enraged, the comedian uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

programme.title: Accused Ep8
programme.desc: Laura's Story - A grieving mother learns that facts and evidence are no match for viral misinformation when she discovers a growing online conspiracy that denies the reality that her son died in a mass shooting. When she engages with the online trolls to set the record straight, she becomes consumed by an endless crusade that tears her family apart.

programme.desc: Hilarious comedy of a tough, hard-hitting Detroit street cop who takes matters into his own hands when a murder investigation takes him to the ultra-chic community of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Sequel to the blockbuster hit, the smart-talking Detroit cop shows the Beverly Hills force how to run business in an attempt to save his friend from an unjust dismissal.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

programme.desc: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

programme.title: American Sicario

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The teams head for Lake Huron, a 3,000-kilometre journey, but the pairs only have one way out of Churchill - a noisy overnight train south.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: High Voltage Killer - After meeting several electric eel attack victims and hearing stories of people who lost their lives, Cyril is determined to catch the biggest one possible and measure its voltage. The only problem is how to avoid being electrocuted in the process.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep11

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Cider - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest cider factory in the world, which produces more than 350 million litres each year.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Outcasts - As the urban world grows, animals are displaced from land that belonged to them. The stories of these wild outcasts are the most captivating of all.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wellington - Coast New Zealand is back once more, and the third series kicks off in the world's southern-most capital city - Wellington.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Flash floods tear through Maryland in the US, a couple get stranded in a Himalayan blizzard, and a boat race is besieged by a rare weather phenomenon.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Michelle Rodriguez - Actress Michelle Rodriguez and Bear Grylls head to the Nevada. Unexpected high winds during a sky-diving trip send Michelle off course; finally the duo must come up with clever ways to stay hydrated.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Iceland: Fire - Learn about the worlds largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chasing Mako - In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Chatty/Communicative - Connect with Earths most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely dont take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters chilling screams; face angry fruit bats loud complaints; and explore orcas human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Survivors of the Plains - In clans of spotted hyenas, larger females call the shots while smaller males live peripheral lives. Meet a family suffering through drought, a mother struggling to provide for her cubs, and an orphan at the bottom of the social pile.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. Shes about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeos calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Coopers hawk whos taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centres skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals stinky natural defences.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emerald Season - Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Handle with Care - Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Handle with Care - Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses of the Sun - Grvys zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we arent vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emerald Season - Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo's Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep35
programme.desc: How Can I Make My Peach Soft? - JESS and the pups give Baa a peach to eat, thinking it will make a change from grass. But the peach is too hard. How can I make my peach soft? Asks Jess. That's the Big Question! He asks Mimi and watches her kneading clay. She explains she's making the clay soft. Jess tries throwing the peach in the air to soften it but all it does is bruise. Horace tells them that the water in his pond keeps his skin soft so Jess and the pups try to soften the peach in water. But it's still hard. They visit Willow who offers the pups some of her lovely ripe cherries. She explains that the cherries went soft and changed colour when they ripened. Jess realises it's the same for the peach. He waits for it to ripen and then gives it to Baa. It's delicious! And now Jess knows how to make a peach soft. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep36
programme.desc: How Can We Help Billy Stay Warm? - Jess, Mimi, Baa and Billie are playing a game, kicking a fir cone into a bucket. But it's so cold that poor shivering Billie can't kick properly. They need to find a way Bilie can stay warm enough. Baa's never cold because of his wool. They find a clump of Baa's wool on the ground but it just falls off Billie when Jess puts it on her and Mimi tells them that glueing it on's a bad idea. What happens when it's summer and Billie wants to be cool? Maybe wrapping her in it, like a blanket, is the answer? It definitely keeps her warm - only problem is, she can't move! They realise that Baa wears a scarf as well. Perhaps they need a scarf for Billie? Mimi knits a tiny scarf for Billie, after twisting the clump of wool into yarn. It's perfect! Billie's toasty warm for their game of Flying Fircones. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep45
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Library - On a trip to the library with Father and Ian, Olivia hopes to renew her fantastic book so she can finish it. During story time the book goes missing and Olivia and Ian set off to find it. She just can't go home without knowing how the book ends!

programme.title: Olivia Ep46
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Wedding Gift - Olivia's favourite art teacher, Miss Davis, is getting married, and Olivia wants to find her the perfect wedding present. But despite all of her fundraising efforts, she only has enough for a very small gift. With help from her classmates, Olivia creates a very special card for Miss Davis to go along with the gift.

programme.title: Olivia Ep47
programme.desc: Olivia Explores Outer Space - Olivia is assigned to do a school project based on one of the planets in the solar system, but they're all so interesting, she just can't decide which one! With a little help from her brother Ian, she finds a solution: create a model of the entire solar system, and maybe even discover a brand new planet in the process

programme.title: Olivia Ep48
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Beach - When Grandma takes Olivia and Ian to a special beach, they're all shocked to find that Grandma's old friend Annette has built a huge fence blocking the best part of the beach. They don't let that stop them from having a good time. Soon with Olivia's prompting, even Annette wants to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep33
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!! and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep34
programme.desc: Why Flea Jumps - You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep35
programme.desc: Why Hummingbird Hums - You see there was a time when Hummingbird didn't hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep36
programme.desc: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom - You see there was a time when Baboon didn't have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Tug Of War Rope - It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi's Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi's Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders how can we hide to watch butterflies? That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx? Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: The Voice Referendum Explained - Misinformation and Disinformation Ep5
programme.desc: With less than a month to go until the referendum, Fran Kelly and Carly Williams explore how the campaigns are harnessing social media while fighting against false information.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep35
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.
